recipesJson.name: Häagen-Dazs - Mango Raspberry Ice Cream by Mr.G
recipesJson.author: Mr-G
recipesJson.description:
Fresh & delicious mango dairy ice cream intertwined and perfectly paired with a real raspberry .  It starts with the sweet taste of the mango that fills your mouth with fragrant smoothness.Enjoy
http://e-liquid-recipes.com/recipe/2209875/Häagen-Dazs%20-%20Mango%20Raspberry%20Ice%20Cream%20by%20Mr.G

reviews.text: i have to say u have some delicious recipes here Mr.g ,keep it up
